steps.instruction: Put all the ingredients except butter into the cook's cylinder. Don't touch the salt and yeast directly.
Start the cook machine, slowly add water to the appropriate state, reserve a portion of water, do not pour all at once.
After kneading for 15 minutes, add the softened butter and continue to knead for 15 minutes.
Knead to the state of the glove membrane.
Divide dough into 12 pieces and cover for 20 minutes.
Roll out the dough.
Fold the sides in half.
Roll out the roll and wrap it up.
Put in the toast mould.
All 12 are done.
Put in the air furnace, do not open the temperature, put in a large cup of hot water to close the door for secondary fermentation.
Fermented to 90% full.
The blast furnace is set for 160 degrees 30 minutes.
Cool on the shelf after the release.
The finished product.

comment.content: Can you tell me what brand of your oven is? Thank you very much!
Hello, what brand is the cooker? I had to buy it for half a year, and now it's all on the bread machine.
Hello, there is no first fermentation of your prescription, only 20 minutes to wake up, and then the final fermentation is done?

steps.instruction: Prepare the material and cut the shallot.
Heat oil in the pan, fry the cooked meat foam, hold up and put aside.
Add oil to the pan, stir-fry the sweet bean.
Add the water and add the pepper, pepper and pepper. Simmer for 7 minutes. Add the Fried meat.
The tofu is cut into small pieces.
Cook for a few minutes.
Add the water starch, then boil the soup.
Put it up, sprinkle with prickly ash and sprinkle with scallions.

comment.content: It's the wrong thing to do. Don't do it without sichuan food.
Don't boil the tofu without salt, just boil it in the pot for a few minutes. Can tofu taste? Nonsense.
HThe oil pan directly added water, I have been Fried flowers, the owner of my face. You should add tofu and water.

steps.instruction: Add a spoonful of salt to the eggplant sliver.
Grab and marinate for more than 10 minutes. This step is important because it deals with the non-oxidizing and discoloration of the eggplant.
Marinate the eggplant and chop a small piece of meat into the meat.
Add white pepper to the mince and give it a proper amount. If you don't want to marinate, don't be lazy, unless you want a good dish to taste!
At the same time, take a small bowl with half a bowl of water, with a little vinegar, a small spoon, and a small amount of soy sauce.
Saute the garlic in the pan with the oil and add the pixian bean paste.
When the meat is white, the eggplant will stir fry.
Pour the mixture into the pan and mix well.
Good food doesn't stop.

comment.content: Excuse me, should the eggplant first clean bubble water, still do not need to bubble water, direct cut easy to use yan to preserve 10 minutes?
Do you want to put some water in the eggplant when it is marinated, just add a teaspoon of salt?
No photos, but according to this make the taste is quite good, my husband says to catch up the taste of the restaurant!
